title: LWAI Chunker Stage
description: Pass in large text, get back smaller chunks and associated vectors.

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

accountName.title: Account Name
accountName.description: Lucidworks AI API Account Name as defined in AI Gateway Service.  This entry should match the account name set in the AI Gateway.

modelName.title: Model for Vectorization
modelName.description: Lucidworks AI Model as defined in documentation

inputContextVariable.title: Input context variable
inputContextVariable.description: Name of the variable in context to be used as input. Supports template expressions.

outputContextVariable.title: Destination Field Name & Context Output
outputContextVariable.description: Note:  MUST contain '*_chunk_vector_*' and must be a dense vector field type.  The name here is used to populate two things with the prediction results:  1) The field name in the document that will contain the prediction, and 2) The name of the context variable that will contain the prediction.

outputTextChunks.title: Destination Field Name for Text Chunks (not the vectors)
outputTextChunks.description: For example, body_chunks_ss.  This field will contain the text chunks that are generated by the chunker.

chunkerConfig.title: Chunker Configuration
chunkerConfig.description: Additional Chunker keys and values to be sent to Lucidworks AI

modelConfig.title: Model Configuration
modelConfig.description: Additional Model configuration parameters to be sent to Lucidworks AI

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Secret associated with the model.  For example, for OpenAI models, the value would start with 'sk-'.

maxTries.title: Maximum Asynchronous Call Tries
maxTries.description: The maximum number of attempts to issue an asynchronous Lucidworks AI API call. Chunking is always asynchronous.

failOnError.title: Fail on Error
failOnError.description: Flag to indicate if this stage should throw an exception if an error occurs while generating a prediction for a document.
